about_the_game:
Diverse and Unique Units

Over 31 distinctive units available at launch, each with special abilities.
Hundreds of units with unique abilities across 11 races.
Featuring Dungeon, Infernal, Empire, Tribal, Mech, Elven, Celestial, Tower, Undead, Orc, and Elemental races, with new units continuously being added.
Form squads with different units for combat, where the outcome depends solely on tactical planning – no random factors involved.

Resource management & Army Cultivation

Multiple random luck-based loot box systems to help you develop your ideal army.
No in-game purchases that disrupt player experience; all resources are reasonably allocated and can be obtained through certain approaches.


Strategically Designed Combat

Choose suitable or favourite units based on real players’ formations and deployed units.
Enjoy unexpected thrills through ability combinations between units.
Utilize the reinforcement mechanism effectively to turn the tide of battle or dominate your opponents.
Select optimal formations and attack strategy to counter your enemies effectively.

PvP Challenges

Upload your defensive formations to the Ladder tournament at any time for other players to challenge.
Match and challenge real players’ formations whenever you want.
Break through the formation of each player.
Will you prove to be the sharpest spear or the hardest shield among all players?

Minimum:

  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics

short_description: Warlord is a strategy game set in a fantasy world filled with mythical creatures. As a commander, you will build and lead your own army. Experiment with unique strategies and tactics to dive into an unmatched experience across various game modes.
